translation.en: I have a reservation under Grace.
translation.fr: J'ai réservé au nom de Grace.

translation.en: Uh, really nice to meet you.
Ah, and it's nice to meet you. [chuckles]
[Grace] Declared missing from a shipwrecked ocean liner,
only to return alive after five-and-a-half years on a desert island.
translation.fr:
et retrouvé cinq ans plus tard
sur une île déserte."

translation.en: Ever since I first read your story, I've been dying to turn it into a book.
translation.fr:
Depuis que j'ai lu cet article,
je veux écrire un livre.

translation.en: You're way more handsome in real life than in your pictures.
translation.fr: Vous êtes plus beau en vrai qu'en photo.

translation.en: -[Grace] You haven't had lunch yet, right? -Uh...
Um, not yet. That's good. I ordered ahead for us.
translation.fr:
- Pas encore.
- Tant mieux, j'ai commandé.

translation.en: Let's just cover the basics while we're waiting for our lunch to come.
translation.fr: Commençons, en attendant que ça arrive.

translation.en: Is it all right if I record?
-[recorder clicks] -Right. How have you been since your return?
translation.fr:
Alors…
Comment allez-vous depuis votre retour ?

translation.en: Adjusting to city life again has been a little rough.
translation.fr: Le retour à la vie normale est compliqué.

translation.en: Oh! Are there strange habits that you can't break from your life in the wild,
translation.fr:
Vous n'arrivez ps à vous défaire
d'habitudes prises sur l'île ?

translation.en: like capturing and eating pets, or running around town with only a spear and a loincloth?
translation.fr:
Comme chasser
ou vous déplacer en pagne avec une lance ?

translation.en: It's just it hasn't been easy being around this many people.
translation.fr: C'est difficile de voir autant de monde.

translation.en: Well, I really appreciate you doing this interview.
I had heard you were turning down everybody that asked for one.
Well, I've been rather torn about that.
I've been worried that no one would believe what I've been through,
translation.fr:
J'avais peur
qu'on ne croie pas mon histoire.

translation.en: But there are some remarkable little creatures that the world should hear about.
translation.fr:
Il existe des créatures fabuleuses
dont je dois parler.

translation.en: But weren't you stranded on the island all alone?
I was alone, and yet I wasn't.

translation.fr: Je me suis fait des amis.

translation.en: I floated in a ducky tube until I spotted an island.
it took five steps to walk from one end of it to the other.
translation.fr: qu'on en faisait le tour en cinq pas.

translation.en: [Chuck] And after six long months alone on the island,
translation.fr: Après six longs mois seul sur l'île,
Mec, il est temps de se sauver !

translation.en: The bugs couldn't be real, though.
Truth is, I didn't believe it at first, either.
translation.fr: Je n'y croyais pas non plus.

translation.en: Being stranded on an island with weird little bugs like them.
translation.fr: Me retrouver sur une île avec deux vers.

translation.en: Oh, could you describe again how the bugs looked?
The red one who's always ticked off is Red.
And the stretched-out long one's name is Yellow.
Uh, yes! There were two bugs, and he called them... -[Chuck] Oh, hang on there. -Huh?
There weren't just two. There was a third.
translation.fr: Il y en avait un de plus. Un troisième.

translation.en: [Chuck] Yeah. A primitive one living in the jungle.
translation.fr:
Oui, il vivait dans la jungle.
Comme un ver des cavernes.

translation.en: Like a cave bug or bug Tarzan.
translation.fr:
Oui, il vivait dans la jungle.
Comme un ver des cavernes. Ou un ver Tarzan.

translation.en: [Chuck] After that, they were always together.
-[Grace] They were always... -Red had the biggest crush on her.
Turns out bugs are just like little slimy people.
I see that you don't believe me either.
translation.fr: Vous ne me croyez pas non plus.

translation.en: Hey, I really don't not believe you.
Unexplainable stuff happens all the time in this world.
[Grace] Just the fact that you were stranded and came back is an incredible story.
translation.fr: Ce qui vous est arrivé est incroyable.

translation.en: Um, then it was you and these three bugs stuck on the island together the whole time?
translation.fr: Donc vous étiez seul avec ces trois vers ?

translation.en: Well, no. It wasn't just me and the bugs.
-Stop it, you stinking bugs! -[yelling] Uh? Huh?
[giggles] Are you serious? A singing seal?
Yes. Whenever I heard Clara's song, I felt happy and warm.
translation.fr:
Oui, quand j'entendais sa chanson,
je me sentais heureux.

translation.en: Bugs that act like little people and a singing seal?
translation.fr: Des vers et un phoque chanteur ?

translation.en: Does an alien visit the island in a UFO?
translation.fr: Un martien est arrivé sur l'île ?

translation.en: Ooh! I was a massive band geek.
[chuckles] We didn't hit it off at first. But I guess I owe him, because he helped me build the boat that got me home.
translation.fr:
On s'entendait pas au début,
mais on a conçu le bateau qui m'a sauvé.

translation.en: Great! I'm very happy to hear that.
translation.fr: Super ! Ça me fait très plaisir.

translation.en: What kinds of things did you eat on the island to survive?
I was hungry all the time.
-Huh? -Let me tell you something about fish.
They don't care if you caught them fair and square! Uh, right.
translation.fr:
- Il se fichent d'être pêchés à la loyale.
- D'accord.

translation.en: Although, Larva helped expand my dinner menu.
translation.fr: Les vers m'ont aidé à me nourrir.

translation.en: [Chuck] The savory aroma of seaweed enfolded my entire body.
translation.fr:
L'arôme salé des algues
enveloppait tout mon corps.

translation.en: It was like waltzing with the waves.
translation.fr: C'était comme valser avec les vagues !

translation.en: And that ribbon of sweetness on top,
translation.fr: Le coulis sucré  éveillait mes papilles,

translation.en: is making all my senses do somersaults in sheer delight!
translation.fr: éveillait mes papilles, qui étaient tout émoustillées !

translation.en: [Chuck] It's the island on a plate!
We're about to eat our entire island!
translation.fr: On va manger toute notre île.

translation.en: [Chuck] I am one with this fish. Yes! Smack me with your life force!
translation.fr:
Je ne fais qu'un avec ce poisson.
Frappe-moi avec ta force vitale !

translation.en: But there's deeper flavor. True treasure!
translation.fr:
Il y a une saveur plus profonde !
C'est un trésor !

translation.en: Felt only in a humpback whale's bellybutton.
translation.fr: Trouvé dans le nombril d'une baleine.

translation.en: Dare I say, the entire earth is in my mouth, massaging my taste buds!
translation.fr: la Terre entière attaque mes papilles !
le goût du porridge de ma mère.

translation.en: [Chuck's mom] It's all right, my dear boy.
Mom, can I please have one more bowl?
translation.fr: Je peux avoir un autre bol, maman ?

translation.en: Sounds gross, but it was so good. -[Wendy laughing] -Uh... Huh?
translation.fr: Ça a l'air immonde, mais c'était bon.

translation.en: Mister, your story's the funniest thing ever!
You know you're not supposed to bother the customers.
translation.fr: Tu ne dois pas déranger les clients.

translation.en: Uh, no, I'm fine with her hearing. -You? -Huh?
Mm, uh, all right, yeah! She's very welcome.
-[laughs] -[manager] Okay, but be quiet. Right, I'll be quiet, Dad.
translation.fr:
- D'accord, mais sois sage.
- Oui, papa.

translation.en: [Grace] Well, shall we get back to it?
Can you tell us about Larva in greater detail?
translation.fr: Vous pouvez nous parler des vers ?

translation.en: One minute, they're at each other's throats, then, turn around, and they're risking their lives for each other.
translation.fr:
Parfois, ils se haïssent,
et l'instant d'après, ils s'apprécient.

translation.en: Fishy, you're mine! How long has it been since I've had fish?
translation.fr:
Attrapé ! Ça fait combien de temps
que j'en ai pas mangé ?

translation.en: [grunts] I've had enough of you brats! Go away!
translation.fr: J'en ai marre de vous. Allez vous-en !

translation.en: [grunting] Take that! [Chuck] You guys ruin everything!
translation.fr: Prenez ça ! Vous me gâchez la vie !
Bon, on va faire du feu…

translation.en: -Lucky me! -[flame crackles] Here we go! Here we go!
translation.fr: Je suis chanceux ! À moi le poisson !

translation.en: Just let me grill my yummy fishy.
Why are you doing this? Why? Why?
Oh, please don't let it go out!
Hold on, flame, here I come!
It's burning! I win! I win! [laughs]
[narrator] The life of a pollack fish.
After the narrow escape, the pollack's relief is short-lived
translation.fr: Après avoir fui, le lieu est en péril...

translation.en: for there are countless dangers that lurk in the ocean.
translation.fr: car en mer, les dangers sont innombrables.

translation.en: However, in the fierce struggle for survival with its natural enemies,
translation.fr:
Mais dans sa lutte acharnée
pour la survie,

translation.en: the pollack has become stronger and smarter.
translation.fr: le lieu est devenu plus fort et malin.

translation.en: Our pollack turns out to be a female.
translation.fr: Notre lieu s'avère être une femelle.

translation.en: With spawning season upon her, many males begin their overtures.
translation.fr: La période de frai arrive et les mâles lui font des avances.

translation.en: The flashy movements of one male are eye-catching.
translation.fr:
Les rapides mouvements
de celui-ci l'attire.

translation.en: [narrator] First comes love. And then, of course, comes...
translation.fr:
Vient d'abord l'amour,
puis viennent, bien sûr…

translation.en: a hundred thousand to a million little fishy miracles.
translation.fr: cent mille à un million petits miracles.

translation.en: And when the time comes, they will leave their parents' embrace
translation.fr: Et le moment venu, ils quitteront le foyer familial

translation.en: to start a new journey in the vast world.
Like their parents, they must survive many hardships and seek out a partner,
translation.fr:
Comme leurs parents,
ils surmonteront des épreuves et trouveront un partenaire

translation.en: so that they may fill the world with little miracles of their very own.
translation.fr:
avec qui remplir le monde
de leurs petits miracles.

translation.en: The life of a pollack fish.
Those bugs are like a phoenix or something.
translation.fr:
- Ces vers sont des phénix ou quoi ?
- Oui !

translation.en: Yes, they are. Those little boogers could survive any danger ever! Uh...
translation.fr:
- Ces vers sont des phénix ou quoi ?
- Oui ! Ils survivent à tous les dangers.

translation.en: -Uh... -Chuck. Lots of people seem interested in this story of yours.
translation.fr:
Chuck, votre histoire intéresse
tout le monde.

translation.en: It's the first time that's happened.
-[Wendy] Mister! -Huh? Please! Please keep telling us your story!
This is the best story I've heard in my 84 years on Earth.
translation.fr:
J'ai jamais rien entendu de tel
en 84 ans d'existence.

translation.en: So true! I'm dying to try some of that tasty bug cuisine. Mmm-mmm.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai !
Je veux goûter à la cuisine de ces vers.

translation.en: Your lunch is on me, if you agree to tell us some more.
translation.fr: Dites-en plus et le repas est offert.

translation.en: Are you all right with them hearing the rest of the interview?
I'm really touched you all wanna hear what I went through.
translation.fr: Ravi de voir que mon histoire vous plaît.

translation.en: If I'm honest here, this is hard to swallow.
translation.fr: Pour être honnête, j'ai du mal à y croire.

translation.en: It sounds like a fantasy movie.
And you haven't heard the half of it.
I haven't even gotten to the crazy stuff.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas parlé… des trucs de fou.

translation.en: Huh? Why is it so cloudy today?
Ah, who cares? I've still got the best boat.
translation.fr: On s'en fiche. J'ai un super bateau.

translation.en: Did I ever tell you until college,
I was on the soccer team!
It's all because of you, bugs!
-[thunder rumbles] -[Chuck] It's all because of you, bugs!
Ah, this ends right now, you hear? No, you don't!
You're done living up to your name.
translation.fr: Tu n'es plus à la hauteur,

translation.en: [groans] Little monsters. I can't wait to turn them into puddles of goo on the beach.
translation.fr:
De vrais monstres.
J'ai hâte d'en faire de la bouillie.

translation.en: -[Chuck] A bug! A bug is me! -[farts]
What have you done to me, you horrible nightmare?
Sorry, I pushed you so darn hard.
I'm a gross and revolting ugly bug.
translation.fr: Je suis un ver sale et dégoûtant.

translation.en: Chicken tried to eat me whole. That even worse...
translation.fr:
Le poulet a essayé de me manger.
Pire encore…

translation.en: I just thought of them as dumb little awful bugs.
translation.fr: Je les voyais comme de stupides vers.

translation.en: -[ship horn blares] -Huh? What? Sounds like... Oh, my!
translation.fr: Quoi ? On dirait un… Ça alors !
Hé ! Je suis là ! À l'aide !

translation.en: [Chuck] Look. Yum, yum, yum! You know you want it!
Not now! Let go of me!
Please! That boat was my ticket back home!
translation.fr: Ce bateau, c'est ma chance de rentrer.

translation.en: Of course, it was only a dream.
Why, you little rotten bugs! Think that's funny, do you?
translation.fr:
Espèce de vers moisis !
Ça vous amuse, hein ?

translation.en: [Chuck] I'm sorry for acting so mean.
After that stuff, I was able to understand them better.
translation.fr: Après ça, j'ai pu mieux les comprendre.

translation.en: Uh! It was a force of habit.
So you're telling us you shared a bond with your bug buddies?
translation.fr:
Donc, vous étiez liés,
vous et vos amis vers ?

translation.en: Yeah. But not just my bug buddies.
With Clara, Booby, Crabsformer. Mudskippers as well.
translation.fr:
Aussi avec Clara, Bassan, Crabsformer.
Et des gobies.

translation.en: We were trying to survive together, after all.
-[chef] Oh! -Wendy, it's all right. Daddy's here, darling.
translation.fr: Wendy, tout va bien. Papa est là.

translation.en: Looks like we're in for some temperamental weather.
The weather on the island was absolutely cuckoo.
translation.fr: Le temps était insensé sur l'île.

translation.en: Either burning hot or freezing cold. [Chuck] Freak tornadoes would rip up out of nowhere.
translation.fr:
Il faisait chaud ou froid.
Des tornades sortaient de nulle part.

translation.en: [Chuck] Why have icebergs completely surrounded the island?
-[flame crackles] -I'm not gonna be an icicle.
We have to burn everything we can.
There's nothing else to burn. [Chuck] What do we do?
translation.fr: Y a plus rien ! On fait quoi ?

translation.en: [Chuck] Is that the... eye of the storm?
Are you kidding? The storm's eye is an actual eye?
translation.fr: C'est une blague ? C'est vraiment un œil ?

translation.en: -[Booby mutters] -Well, let's give it a poke.
This is pretty messed up right here.
We've got to put that big eye out!
translation.fr: Il faut se débarrasser de l'œil !

translation.en: [Chuck] If I hadn't seen it with my own eyes, I wouldn't believe it myself.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'aurais pas vu,
je n'y croirais pas.

translation.en: [Granny] Any of them wear glasses, you think?
Um, so, then, tell us how you got off the island.
-Yeah. -Tell us how you escaped! Yes, do that!
That's what I was thinking the whole time I was there.
translation.fr: C'est ce que je me disais.

translation.en: [Chuck] But I failed to escape so many times.
-I don't even know how many rafts I made. -Hmm.
...something happened that meant we had to leave the island.
translation.fr:
il s'est passé quelque chose
et on a dû partir.

translation.en: We need to leave now. -[Chuck] Everybody here? -[robotic mutter]
translation.fr:
Il faut qu'on parte !
Vous êtes tous là ?

translation.en: How can we ever get across that?
[grunts] Right. Come on. [Chuck] It's live or die time.
translation.fr: Allez, soit on agit, soit on meurt !

translation.en: I guess this is how I'm going to die.
translation.fr: C'est comme ça qu'on va mourir.

translation.en: You guys take care. Hm. Enjoy my last performance.
translation.fr:
Portez-vous bien.
Profitez de ma dernière danse.

translation.en: I'm gonna die for acting nice. I'm such a dumb, dumb, stupid--
translation.fr:
Je vais mourir pour être gentil.
Je suis débile.

translation.en: This is the end of it all.
To ending this after all the suffering.
I thought if I just got off the island, then I'd be fine.
translation.fr: Je pensais m'en tirer en quittant l'île.

translation.en: God, are you gonna end me this way?
Where did all the flying fish come from?
You know, thank goodness you guys are here.
translation.fr: Vous savez… Heureusement que vous êtes là.

translation.en: Then I said farewell to everyone and I was alone.
translation.fr:
Je leur ai dit adieu
et me suis retrouvé seul.

translation.en: Uh, but still, you at least were able to return home safely.
translation.fr: Tout de même. Vous avez réussi à rentrer vivant.

translation.en: But I lost the family I found there.
translation.fr: Oui, mais je... J'ai perdu ma famille.

translation.en: I wonder if they're all all right.
I'm sure your little bug friends are safe and happy somewhere.
translation.fr:
Je suis sûre qu'ils vont bien
et sont heureux.

translation.en: [manager] You said yourself they never die.
translation.fr:
- Ils ne meurent jamais.
- Ils sont forts !

translation.en: -[Wendy] They're strong. -[Granny] We're right, you know.
translation.fr:
- Ils ne meurent jamais.
- Ils sont forts ! On a raison.

translation.en: And they keep on smiling, no matter what.
Please tell us other adventures you had with Larva.
Ooh! Larva! Larva! Larva! [Wendy] Best story ever!
translation.fr:
- Allez-y ! Les vers !
- La meilleure des histoires !

translation.en: Yeah, all right. I'll tell you about the time me and Larva went shark fishing.
translation.fr:
D'accord.
Je vais vous raconter la pêche au requin.

translation.en: We got stuck right in a big humpback whale's blowhole.
translation.fr:
On était coincés dans l'évent
d'une énorme baleine !

translation.en: [manager] It's been great. Come back anytime.

translation.fr:
- Revenez quand vous voulez.
- Merci. Au revoir !

translation.en: Well, that was certainly something else.
-I don't remember having a nicer talk. -Uh...
Thanks very much for talking to me today.
I realized today it's not as important everyone believe me as I thought it was.
translation.fr:
J'ai compris que peu importait
que l'on me croie ou non.

translation.en: As long as I still remember my friends, I'll remember it's all true.
translation.fr:
Tant que je me souviendrai
de mes amis, ce sera vrai.

translation.en: [Chuck] Whether people believe it all really happened,
translation.fr: Que les gens me croient ou non,

translation.en: I finally truly feel like I've completely left the island behind.
translation.fr:
J'ai enfin l'impression
d'avoir quitté l'île.

translation.en: Well, we're happy to have you back, Chuck.
Thanks very much, Grace. I won't forget your help. Ever.
translation.fr:
Merci beaucoup, Grace.
Je n'oublierai pas votre aide.

translation.en: [Grace] To be honest, when I first heard his story,
I thought he was a big, lying liar pants.
Even now, I'm still not sure I believe all of it.
translation.fr:
Encore maintenant,
je ne suis pas sûre d'y croire.

translation.en: But I've written this book with the earnest hope
translation.fr: Mais j'ai écrit ce livre avec l'espoir

translation.en: that everyone will hear of his amazing experiences,
translation.fr: que tous entendront parler de son histoire

translation.en: and the special friends he made on the island.
translation.fr: et des amis qu'il s'est fait.

translation.en: And I hope people enjoy my writing too.
translation.fr: J'espère que mon style sera apprécié.

translation.en: [Grace] Could it all be hooey in bunk?
Everyone who heard Chuck's brave, intense story,
translation.fr: Ceux qui ont entendu cette histoire

translation.en: -myself included... -[Wendy giggles] [Grace] ...felt almost transported to the island themselves.
translation.fr:
dont moi,
se sont sentis transporté sur cette île.

translation.en: It was clearly real to Chuck.
-And frankly... -Huh? -[groans] -...that's good enough for this writer.
[Grace] I hope it's real to all who read this book as well.
translation.fr: J'espère que les lecteurs le croiront.

translation.en: [Chuck] Oh, no, no. I just left.
